tool.name: pRESTO PairSeq
tool.description: Sorts and matches sequence records with matching coordinates across files
tool.command: ln -s $r1_in r1.fastq && ln -s $r2_in r2.fastq && PairSeq.py -1 r1.fastq -2 r2.fastq --coord $coord #if $r1_annotations --1f $r1_annotations #end if #if $r2_annotations --2f $r2_annotations #end if --outdir=. --outname=tmp_pairseq && mv ./tmp_pairseq-1_pair-pass.* $r1_out && mv ./tmp_pairseq-2_pair-pass.* $r2_out

param.name: r1_annotations
param.label: Annotation(s) to copy from R1 to R2.

param.name: r2_annotations
param.label: Annotation(s) to copy from R2 to R1.

tool.help:
Sorts and matches sequence records with matching coordinates across files.
See the `pRESTO online help <https://presto.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tools/PairSeq.html>`_ for more information.
